00095     inline bool operator == (const RMLFlags &Flags) const
00096     {
00097         return (    (this->SynchronizationBehavior
00098                         ==  Flags.SynchronizationBehavior)
00099                 &&  (this->EnableTheCalculationOfTheExtremumMotionStates
00100                         ==  Flags.EnableTheCalculationOfTheExtremumMotionStates)

00102                         ==  Flags.PositionalLimitsBehavior) );
